english.segment1: I've been picked when I was low. And I never have been left alone. I know it's true. Thanks to you
english.segment2: I have had my burdens shared. There've been valleys. That I've been carried through. Thanks to you
english.segment3: So I won't let another moment slip away. Right here, right now. I've got to stop and say
english.segment4: Thanks to you. I've learned to laugh a little bit harder. Thanks to you. I never cry alone. Thanks to you. I know what it means to have a friend that's true. Thanks to you
english.segment5: I remember all the walks. And all the crazy things that I got talked into. Thanks to you
english.segment6: . And even now I'm amazed. When I think of all the ways God's voice came through. Thanks to you
english.segment7: Through all the thick and thin. And places in between. We have been side by side. And that is why you hear me singing
english.segment8: Thanks to you. I've learned to laugh a little bit harder. Thanks to you. I never cry alone. Thanks to you. I know what it means to have a friend that's true. Thanks to you. For never giving up. Thanks to you. For sometimes giving in. Thank you for always listening
